New Records: Najmul Hossain Shanto registered his career-best in T20Is with 71 runs
Key Match Events: Mustafizur Rahman had his miserly and effective best performance, returning 2 for 15 from his four overs
Bangladesh claimed a chaotic final-over finish to win the match
Pre-Game Insights: Najmul Hossain Shanto and Mustafizur Rahman were under pressure due to their recent poor form
The team management had full backing of Shanto, which drew criticism from some in Bangladesh cricketing circles
Post-Match Reflections: Shanto expressed that he was not under pressure due to the team management's support
He was wary of not throwing away another start and made use of a good start to score his career-best in T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh's pace attack showed good form, with Taskin Ahmed and Mustafizur Rahman performing well
The batting group might still be looking for the right balance, regardless of whether they play seven or eight specialist batters
